title: UDL Framework Application Training for Inclusive Mathematics Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic mathematical knowledge and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen customized math education design competencies for professional adult learners in digital device-enabled environments

learning_goals: At least two instructional design plans for mathematics classes applying the UDL 3 principles (Representation, Action & Expression, Engagement) can be proposed.
An inclusive assessment tool (project-based) considering diverse learner characteristics is developed and applied.
Three strategies for explaining mathematical concepts using digital assistive tools (calculators, visualization software) are implemented.

resources: Mathematics Teaching and Learning Resource Kit

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
